# bareCourier

> A PWA for a solo dental lab courier to manage pickups and deliveries.

bareCourier is a mobile-first web application built with SvelteKit, Svelte 5, Tailwind CSS v4, and Supabase. It replaces paper-based tracking for a dental lab courier service with digital service management.

## Tech Stack

- Framework: SvelteKit 2.50+ with Svelte 5 (runes syntax)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS v4 with @tailwindcss/vite plugin
- Components: shadcn-svelte (new-york style, OKLCH colors)
- Backend: Supabase (Auth + Postgres + Row Level Security)
- PWA: @vite-pwa/sveltekit
- Deployment: Vercel with adapter-vercel

## Key Features

- Two user roles: courier (admin) and client (dental labs)
- Service status tracking: pending (blue) â†’ delivered (green)
- One-tap status toggle for quick updates
- Monthly reports with CSV export
- Client self-service portal for new requests
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Database Tables

### profiles
User profiles extending Supabase auth.users with role, name, phone, default_pickup_location, active status.

### services
Pickup/delivery jobs with client_id, pickup_location, delivery_location, status, notes, created_at, delivered_at.

## Source Code

- Routes: src/routes/ (login/, courier/, client/)
- Components: src/lib/components/ui/ (shadcn-svelte)
- Types: src/lib/database.types.ts
- Auth: src/hooks.server.ts (Supabase SSR)
- Migrations: supabase/migrations/
